course_title: Early Childhood Education Practicum and Seminar I

61A.comments: Registration to this practicum course is blocked.Students completing the BC ECE Basic Certificate program of courses with Early Childhood Education who meet the prerequisites for practicum will be contacted and registered by the program.Inquiries: http://earlychildhood.educ.ubc.ca/about/contact-us.
